title: Two Beauty Picks: Clever Lipstick + Maracuja Miracle Oil
content:
Sophie always introduces me to the coolest stuff whenever we're at Sephora. Here are two of my recent favorites: The first is this Guerlain lipstick which comes in this super pretty silver tube. As you pull the lipstick out, the cap—which is secretly a mirrored compact—opens up. It would be such a great holiday gift! (Made us think of our mom who is forever looking for a mirror to refresh her lipstick). 

The second is this tarte Maracuja Oil (otherwise known as a miracle oil). At first, I was hesitant to try it because I already have oily/combo skin, and wearing an oil sounded, well, oily, but Sophie convinced me I would love it. I've worn this to bed every night this week instead of my regular moisturizer (just two drops is enough for my whole face), and my skin looks and feels awesome. It might just be in my head (Sophie says it's not) but my skin is brighter and more even-toned than before. I'm hooked!

Would you try either? What are your favorite beauty products lately?
